## Owning the Timeline: Why My Archive Matters More Than My Audience

Audiences fluctuate. Platforms decay. Timelines endure. This essay explains why a complete, verifiable personal archive is more valuable than any follower countâ€”and why future-you is the most important reader you will ever have.

tags: Owning the Timeline: Why My Archive Matters More Than My Audience

Audiences fluctuate. Platforms decay. Timelines endure. This essay explains why a complete, verifiable personal archive is more valuable than any follower countâ€”and why future-you is the most important reader you will ever have.
